tool_description: My API generate convert URL requests into QR-codes. Enter a domain name after the qr-code section in the URL and it automatically generates a response image and downloads into your computer.
title: API_QR_CODE GENERATOR

api_list.name: Image Downloader and Response
api_list.description: This endpoint downloads image uses the the methods=["GET"] parameter to get URL in "www.example.com" URL, Generating a response QR-code to PNG conversion.
